tag_list: miodrag-jokic, krediti-rs, investicionifondovi-com, adriatalk-com, blogger, project-manager
overview: Miodrag Jokic is Project Manager at Krediti.rs and Co-founder at AdriaTalk.com along with Jadranka Stancic. Miodrag has written many articles and research papers covered in South-East Europe top media (B92, Blic, Danas, 24 sata, Slovenian National Television, krediti.rs, Ekonomist magazine, TV Vojvodina, Serbian National Television - RTS). He is former ERP consultant and former back office associate at one of the largest serbian stock broker companies - Sinteza Invest Group.

image.attribution: Miodrag Jokic at the “Development of the capital markets” conference

milestones.description: Joined a serbian loan startup Krediti.rs
